page.title: 04TYWARDREATH PRIMARY SCHOOL 1
page.content: At 8.45 a.m. I arrive at school then the bell goes at 9a.m. for{ {Registration.}Between those times the top recorder group sets up in the Hall so we can play the Hymns for Assembly. I play the Treble. At 9.10 another bell goes for{ {Assembly.}When Assembly ends classes 9 and 10, the top classes, change for English and Maths. We have English with Mr. Martin first then after break we have Maths with Mrs. Bennett. We have a {school tuck shop}which sells crisps and biscuits. Some of us run it before school and at morning break. { Mornings}are usually pretty much the same. At lunch time I sometimes help in the{Library}or have a choir practice or Treble Recorder group. I bring packed lunch but others eat { {school dinners}from our own canteen.
